titleStmt.title: Dainty conceits with a number of rare and witty inuentions, neuer before printed. Made and inuented for honest recreation, to passe away idle houres. By Thomas Iohnson.
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Thomas, d. 1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[lizabeth] A[llde] for Henry Gosson and Francis Coules,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A new booke of dainty conceits.
Identified as STC 14701 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
